title: Alex Jones Show - 2011 Apr 27 WE [sebaygo1]
description:
.
							
The Alex Jones Show
Wednesday, 27 April 2011


[sebaygo1]


Scheduled Guests
................

From the Infowars web site ::

In light of the release of Obama's purported birth certificate, Alex talks with activist attorney Philip Berg, who filed a complaint in federal district court in 2008 against then Democratic Party presidential nominee Senator Barack Obama alleging that he was born actually in Mombasa, Kenya. 


Alex also talks with author, researcher, and radio host Webster Tarpley about Obama's birth certificate. Tarpley is the author of Barack H. Obama: The Unauthorized Biography and Obama: The Postmodern Coup - Making of a Manchurian Candidate. 


British politician and critic of the theory of man-made global warming, Lord Christopher Monckton, also joins as Alex.



Other guests include Mancow Muller, Porter Stansberry of (show sponsor) Stansberry & Associates Investment Research, and Ted Anderson (live commercial for Midas Resources).

 It is my opinion that in this time it is virtually essential 
 to seek information from a variety of sources, to listen to a
 spectrum of voices in order to better  understand the "big 
 picture." A reliance solely upon mainstream corporate media 
 for news and info is a prescription for ignorance. I try to
 share information that counters the monotone of mainstream
 corporate media. 

 NOTE: The material here is made available strictly as
 information. Do not assume my support for or endorsement 
 of the contents.

 Think for yourself! To paraphrase the late William Cooper:

 until you've researched it yourself.
